content.detailedDescription: Other people had to of seen this ufo. i was looking out my window and saw what looked like a black disc flying through dark clouds. it was very hard to see for it was very flat looking. it was moving much quicker then an airplane but slow enough for me to watch it for about 2 minutes. when i saw it pass in front of a white cloud i gasped! the size of it was much bigger then i had thought! it looked about as long as a good sized parking lot! all i could see was the edge so i couldn't tell if it was a disc or a cigar shaped craft. the size of it was just shocking! it was so quiet and so quick and so jaw dropping! it came from the north and traveled across the sky towards the east and disappeared into the clouds on the east side. i live right next to hampden, right on the edge of denver, did anyone else see this??
content.summary: Long disc shaped ufo, very large!!

content.detailedDescription: Was driving east bound on hiway 10 between the towns of alton iowa and granville when i suddenly saw 7 white lights hovering about 35 degrees off of the horizon. i watched for no more then 10 seconds and they faded one by one. i took out my cell phone to record them if they came back on but nothing. after this report i am going outside to scan the sky again with my cell phone hoping to capture what i saw so i can share with anyone interested.
content.summary: Seen about 7 lights hovering and as soon as i seen them they slowly disappeared

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were meeting friend to watch a firework show on puget sound near lakewood, wa when i looked up and saw what i thought was a firework until it continued moving very slowly and i observed it moving from the west traveling north in a straight path making no noise and the height was just above a nearby radio tower which it flew over before i lost sight of it and my friends son and a few of his friends also saw the object and we were all a little freaked out about it cause we all are used to aircraft flying overhead being from this area and could not explain what this object was. the best way i could describe the object is that it looked like a straw hat that was on fire but not engulfed in flames, more like it was made of plasma because it looked like pictures that i've seen of the surface of the sun. i've lived in tacoma, wa all of my life near mcchord afb and i know what an airplane and other aircraft look like and this was not like any conventional or military aircraft known to the public. it really shook me up and have just now been able to get to your site to report it.
content.summary: First thought it was a firework until it continued to procede in straight line, didn't explode and made no noise

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the hot tub facing east, the night was clear and i could see stars clearly.  while looking for satellites i observed an aircraft with 2 solid red lights at a high altitude flying from west to the northeast.  this is out of the ordinary for air traffic in our area, it is mainly north or south direction. i thought it was a military craft but the red lights were behind each other in a straight line in the same direction it was going, not horizontal as on airplane wings. at this point you could cover the 2 lights with a 1 inch pencil held at arms length. i watched it until it went out of sight behind some trees. about 15 seconds later it came out of the trees heading south and quite a bit lower. at this point you could cover the 2 lights with an 3 inch pencil and you could see a white strobe light positioned in the middle of the 2 red lights and above them. i'm assuming that it is positioned on the top of the craft as i didn't see it when it flew directly over me. i could not make out the shape of the craft because it was moonless at this time and there was some steam coming off the hot tub. the strobe light was blinking, but not consistant but in a random blinking.  the speed of the craft was faster than the regular aircraft i see. i watched the craft until i lost sight of it behind some trees. it looked to be traveling at a level altitude. there could have been sound but i had the hot tub jets turned on so i couldn't tell. it flew in a smooth constant manner. i don't know if this is military or not. it has been bugging me since i saw it.  i would like to know if anyone has seen this type of craft and if it could be military. it seemed like it turned and dropped in elevation at a rate that military craft can't but i'm no expert. the date is just approximate.
content.summary: 2 red solid lights 1 strobe light

content.detailedDescription:
On friday, november 11th, 2011 i was driving south on i-55 from st. louis on my way to texas. around 11:15 pm and about 30 ��� 45 miles north of memphis something out of my driver side window caught my eye. the sky was clear and it was a perfect night to watch stars. i noticed three large, solid, bright lights in the shape of a v. at second glance, there was more going on than just the three lights. there was a cluster of different size and color lights. my first thought was that i must be near a memphis airport. however, none of the objects appeared to be landing or taking off. there was also no sign of an airport below them. 

the three original lights kept their formation while some of the smaller ones were just moving back and forth. their movement was smooth, but the way they changed directions was odd. i didn���t feel like i was in any danger, they appeared to be busy doing whatever it was they were doing. 

i rolled my window down, steered with my knee, and switched my phone to camera. i checked the view finder quickly and snapped one shot. i checked to see if the camera caught any of the lights and surprisingly saw three lights were in the frame. i looked for a couple of more seconds and kept driving. as i was rolling the window up i noticed that there was a helicopter flying low to the ground and headed in the direction. 

the entire thing happened in less than a minute and i really didn���t expect much from the picture. when i put it on a computer and blew it up i was in complete shock. i would love to speak with anyone else who may have witnessed something similar near the tn, mo and ar border. 

[email removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Multiple shapes, colors and objects

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
we were driving southbound rt. 2, then eastbound rt. 214 in edgewater, md.
  
2. what made you first notice the object?
there were very bright lights in the sky.  4-5 clusters of white lights.  pretty low, some of them just above the treeline. one witness remembers them being all in a straight line.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
maybe an airplane, but then realized that the objects were not moving at all-just hovering.  

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
the objects stayed stationary the entire time.  then one disappeared out of nowhere.  slowly the rest disappeared one by one. 

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
we were very intrigued and couldn���t stop staring as we were driving.

6. how did you lose sight of the object?
the objects disappeared one by one.
content.summary: Bright lights in the sky: edgewater, md 21037

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to pick my wife up from the train station at 2:00pm on 11/15/11 and observed an incredibly bright light hovering in the distance. it looked like a car's highbeams would at night. i slowed down to observe it and noticed other drivers looking as well. i was able to observe it for a few minutes until i drove through a wooded area and lost it. it appeared to be at least 10x larger and brighter than any plane or star i have seen in the past.
content.summary: Very bright light over paoli, pa

content.detailedDescription:
At the intersection of 291 and langsford road in my car.
a large bright light shot across the sky at extreme speed at about the distance of lee's summit high school from where i was at but depth perseption isn't that great at night.
i thought it was a plain at first but it was too close to the ground and moving way too fast, so maybe a meteor but i've never seen one that close.  
the center of the light was an orange glowing ball leaving a long trail of a yellow/white light. then it flashed really bright and disapeared.
my friend i was following in my car saw the same thing, definitely one of the coolest things i have ever seen!
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Circle,   Fireball,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: A large bright light shot across 291 then flashed and disapeared

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the vikings / packers game, my wife went outside to smoke and called me out to show me something "you have to see this". starting due west over the white tank mountains, 3 redish / orange pusalting orbs in unchanging triangular formation moved to the n-nw for about a minute and a half then moved closer together then one by one disappeared up and to back to the west.
content.summary: Three red pulsating orbs in

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on i-39,it was 8:50 pm i noticed one glowing light and then four more came to light, they were orange in color. when they appeared they seem to just appear, kind of like some body was turning lights on with a dimmer switch. as soon as all lights lit they dissapeared. the lights were in a straight line . i thought it was very interesting.I had seen lights like this on 7/29/2008 in the same area but on the other side of the interstate. this area is about five miles south of the central wisconsin airport. i know for sure these where not an airplane. both times i saw the lights it was a clear sky and i was driving down the interstate. i could not see anything but the lights.
content.summary: Glowing lights

content.detailedDescription: After picking my daughter from school, we were walking through the highschool ballfield when we saw a huge shadow on the ground. when we looked up, we saw a circular shaped object (cerca 60 feet in diameter) hovering right over us(cerca 150 feet high). we were both frozen in schock and couldn't speak at all.The object was not producing any sound, we could just see the lights going around. in the middle, the object seemed to have a circular shape with spirals on the surface.Then my daughter tripped; trying to catch her, i looked down for couple of seconds. when we looked up again, the object was gone. i asked my daughter what she saw and to please draw a picture of the object. she drew exactly what i saw; i asked her to do this because i was not sure what exactly happened to us. we have not talked about this for a long time because it makes us very uncomfortable. i have always thought that ufo stories were a hoax, but i know now that they are real. i am unsure..Why or what is happening, but this experience has affected my life in a way where all traditional beliefs that i had been raised with came tumbling down.
content.summary: Object seen by my daughter and me on a bright sunny afternoon. can't explain why this large object was not seen by anyone else.

content.detailedDescription: When taking my dog out into my back yard, i briefly noted what i initially perceived to be a plane. my back yard abuts a wide open and quite spacious state owned desert area with what i suppose one would call small mountains or very large hills. there's no available ground lighting in the area save for that of the housing in the neighborhood so it's ideal for watching the stars. when i returned my vision to that where i had seen the 'plane' it had not moved. i stopped and stared at the object for probably two or three minutes. i became keenly interested because i had always imagined that this would be a great property to seek out ufo's but i wasn't exactly prepared for what i was about to see. i ran back into the house to get my binoculars and when i returned the object had still not moved. when i put the optics to my eyes and focused, i saw what appeared to be a platform of sorts that had a red light on one end with large canister or rectangular shaped objects that were rotating and exhibiting brilliantly intense colors of red, reddish pink, blue, green, and amber. if i could relate it to something i know, i would say it was something like a ferris wheel tilted at a forty-five degree angle with only four or five seating cabins that each take turns changing colors. i wasn't fearful so much as i was fascinated as i watched it continue to do it's thing. i was upset that no one was there with me to watch so i decided that, even though my wife has a difficult time sleeping, i would go in and wake her. i went in and got her and, thankfully, she saw the same thing. she said,"it has all different colored lights and it's not moving." i sent her back into bed and called the nearby wlliams gateway airport and asked if they could see the same thing and they stated they couldn't see it. as i was talking on the phone with them, i was looking around and trying to establish a distance and orientation from the moon or some other large star when i saw what i thought was another object exhibiting the same behavior. i concentrated on it for a moment and verified that, yes, it was doing the same thing. from my view, the second object appeared about a foot in perspective from the first. there was no way for me to determine the distance or altitude from me or any other point of reference. as i continued to look further, i was unnerved to find that there were no less than eight and possibly as many as twelve of these 'floating platforms' in the sky. i've gone out each successive night since then and found the same types of craft or images in different areas of the sky with the exception of two nights ago when it was overcast. i retrieved my neighbor last night and he confirmed the same thing. i really hope someone with some good visual equipment could look at this and either help me find out what it is or put me in contact with someone who can. i do know that there is a satellite within the same area and i'm told that there is an office of homeland security almost directly underneath where i witnessed the closest one.
content.summary: Multiple stationary red tipped platforms that have rotating rectangular intensely and variously colored apparatus-es.

content.detailedDescription:
Standing in backyard at 8:22am facing north.  observed a very large, white, rectangular object  flying just above the cloud cover traveling east to west.  no sound or contrails, unlike any aircraft i've ever seen.  lost track of object due to woods surrounding property obstructing view.

clearly white and rectangular, roughly seven times it's height in length.
content.summary: Observed a very large, white, rectangular object.

content.detailedDescription: Well,i was out side my house,clear day .Ilooked up and was looking at a passenger jet in the distance{contrails].Thats when i noticed a small very very shinny like sunshine on polished chrome,real bright comming towards me,{in my direction]i ran inside and grabed my kodak cx7430 4.0 mega pixels .The object then made a smooth sweeping turn  headed south.The photos i have sent are outside my house.I did not see the other object in photo lower left ,till i looked at photos on comp. wow.Ive sent same report to u.F.O.S north west.But to my suprize, not one person has said anything about my post,i mean if anything its military and id say no jet ,is going to touch this. of course,im guessing.The other object i got two photos of [i did not see at time of taking photos of main object]but clearly its following first object.I dont know it just was gone, i was exited but i did get some evidence of high tech wonder machines.
content.summary: Small very bright object flying no jet trail,the turn and head south .

content.detailedDescription: Yesterday on sunday, 11/13/11, my boyfriend was sitting in the living room playing a video game. he looked out the window next to his chair and saw a bright light on the northwest horizon. not really thinking anything of it at first because there is an airport over in that direction. and we see planes all the time. then he noticed that it wasn't moving. it was just after 6:00 pm, and already dark outside. that's when he called me to come over to the window and check it out. we are in a high-rise building so we have a pretty good view for miles in the north, west, and south directions. so we sat and watched it for a little while and then i decided to get my phone and record it. we were pretty stunned and amazed. it hovered for the longest time, and every so often would get brighter, then dimmer. it wasn't very high up, and it wasn't too low, it seemed about a few hundred feet above treetop level. occasionally it seemed to disappear when a plane would go by. we were watching it and taking turns looking through the binoculars. to the naked eye, it looked like a bright light about the size of a bb, and you could easily see the light getting brighter and dimmer, and the tiny changing colors, almost like the way a star flickers. whereas on the video, you can't because my low resolution phone camera sucks, and it wouldn't let me zoom in. and i only recorded it for like a few minutes or so. anyway, when you looked through the binoculars, the view was even better. i thought it was a sphere, until i looked through the binoculars. we could see the flat disc-like shape, and the different colors of spinning lights. the object itself was spinning very fast it seemed. clearly not a helicopter. a short time later, another one seemed to just "pop up" to the right of it, except a tiny bit lower. that one also acted the same way the first one did, with the spinning lights getting brighter then dimmer. they both hovered there doing the same thing. then a really short time later, the second one disappeared. the first one stayed for a little while longer, then disappeared. i cant give you exact time periods because i'm not sure but i can tell you that we think it started at about 6 pm because we had checked the time when we were watching it and it was just after 6. then just tonight, 11/14/11 it happened again, at 6 pm just after it got dark. i know this because for some reason i was anticipating its return, and i had been looking out the window. except this time it only lasted like 20 or so minutes, and there was only one. i'm not sure if it happened again, because i haven't looked out the window since then. i recorded that one for only less than a minute. it was actually pretty exciting. i just wish we could've got a better view. u just have to keep watching the first video to really be able to see it. and the second one i recorded at the last minute of it, so u can really only see it best at the beginning. i apologize for the bad quality of the videos. i only wish you could see it the way we saw it, and not the poor picture that the camera picked up.   **i tried to upload the videos but for some reason it didn't work. i will keep trying.
content.summary: Bright spinning object(s) hovering near kci airport and 291 highway on horizon in kansas city.

content.detailedDescription: We saw a green orb we my friend and i were returning from taking my other friend home.We were already on edge after my friend had already seen a ufo following his scooter.
content.summary: Returning from taking my friend home when me and my other friend saw a green orb

content.detailedDescription: I was being folloowed by a green light from my house to my friend's house for about 4 minutes.
content.summary: Green light following scooter

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down the road, i snapped a picture of a crashed citylink bus to show my husband. 

i was going to show my husband the picture of the crash when he got home from work and noticed the object.

i had no idea what it was.

i was just curious if it was a ufo or not. 

i noticed it in the picture when i checked it.
content.summary: Abilene ufo

content.detailedDescription: Took these pics tru oct -nov in my back yard it looks like a star until you zoom in on it,it changes .
content.summary: Starlike flashing lights

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were walking on the beach and looking south from venice island when we noticed some lights in the sky over the gulf of mexico. we saw one, then two, then three and they all blinked out at once. then we saw three again much further to the west. they also blinked out at the same time. then we saw one light appear, then two, three, four, five, six and seven until there were seven in a row in the sky.  they all disappeared at the same time.
my husband said we just saw a ufo! we were very excited!
content.summary: Strange lights all the same in the sky over gulf of mexico

content.detailedDescription: I was in the parking lot of my apt buildin preparing to bring up  groceries. i pulled up to the front of my building as i asked my wife to bring a cart to bring them up stairs. when my wife arrived with the cart...I proceeded to the rear back passanger side of my car to start loading the cart. as i bent down to grab a 50lb bag of rice i heard my wife exclaim ..."whoa". as it happened, as she said that i simultaneously was turning my sight toward the direction that she was naturally facing. at which point i saw what appeared to be what i thought was a shooting star over head.  the shooting star that zipped by was extremly low. unbelievably low. i put the 50lb bag of rice in the cart, grabbed my iphone out of my pocket....And began recording in the general direction of where it shot towards in front of a treeline. immediately on the iphone i noticed within the trees a blinking pulsating brake like red light turning on and off within the trees. standing near my wife, not sure what it was i brought it to her attention as i was immediately confused as i paned my eyes to the trees i saw nothing....But then back to the iphone theres the light. then several more lights appeared within the trees white, and several were like a road flare or flare gun color and illumination. i grabed two other random building residents through out the event who saw the same thing. i paned the camera around to see what other objects within a close proximity may appear at which point when i moved the camera to the sky directly above 7 blinking lights in the tree line....I saw a white star like object directly above int he sky that was blinking on and off. it was a clear night at that time...So it was blatanly obvious that it was there. it turned on and off...Almost exhibiting behavior like a light that is almost dead and it starts flickering. it did that same thing expect the flickering was slow...But with each...Slow flicker what looked like a faint spec of a white dot materialized into a fully symetrically spherical dot...But the flickering continued...And then what was one dot was somehow now two distinct sepearate dots...Then finally there were three sepearate dots at which point it started gently gliding toward the building at which point i noticed that what was only visible with my iphone...I could now see naturally with my own eyes as well as within the iphone itself. the object formed a triangel with the just the 3 spherical lights whiter than white lights no other form visbible structure wise as inbetween them was blackness. i brought my attention back to the iphone as the object was almost over the building it did something that would perhaps best be viewed on video for effect, but it suddenly had a blurry glow of red around it while simultaneously doing what looked like a vibration (more aptly a shake) then it jolted forward several ??? unknown amount of feet ahead then was back to the normal three dots. then it glided gently over the apt bldng.
content.summary: Witnessed object at length. recorded video...Took photos. would rather talk to someone. live for forensic analysis of my video.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving north on vt rte 5 at about 1am on about february 14, 1995 in wells river vt. i just made the turn onto rte 302 and was about to go over the bridge spanning the conneticut river into nh. when i was infront of h.O. taylor's chevrolet i repositioned myself in my seat as my back was aching, and when i did so this thing appeared right over me through the windshield. it was symetrical and half an ovoid cut through the center and looked like a shoe heel. i did not see it come or go, it was sort of like in a freeze frame. it was a starry night with no moon, but the starlight was very bright. what i saw was this half ovoid shape outlined in white sparks, like those from a sparkler, and the shape was solid as it blocked out the starlight completely. it was black and i didn't see any lights or windows. i gathered from the direction that the sparks were flying that the flat end of this shape was the leading edge. when i looked at a map later it appeared to have been going in an almost perfect westerly direction. with the speed this thing was going i bet it was over vt and ny states and over the great lakes in a matter of a few seconds. though i had nothing to gauge the size of this thing to my impression was that it was huge, like very huge. there was no sound at all, no boom or anything like that. my car engine died when i saw it. though i was sort of shocked i immediately jumped out of my car and looked to the west and didn't see or hear anything. i stood there for a few seconds then realized it was about 20 below zero and jumped back into my car, the engine started with no problem. i might add that i had bought the car new about six months before this incident,and had no trouble with it. i was not afraid, didn't feel threatened, just was very perplexed and still am. i live in a military operations area and have seen and heard f15s,f16s, transports,and various types of strangely shaped conventional aircraft, etc. at day and night, as have my friends, coworkers,and neighbors. i have also seen, during my lifetime, blimps, helicopters of various types, and hot air balloons.I have also seen a comet,various meteor showers,the space station,the space shuttle, and satelites. i have never seen anything like this ufo before or since. i question whether ets have ever been to earth but i know what i saw. i once told the above to a department head of astronomy at a prestigious university. he looked at me like i had three heads, and very curtly said "i don't know" and turned on his heels and was gone in a flash. i might add that i am a professional in good standing in my job and community and don't drink or take drugs.
content.summary: Symetrical half ovoid shape, sold, outlined in white sparks, fast, and huge.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv in my room, my parents were already asleep, when i heard this loud, hovering sound directly over my house. it sounded almost as if an extremely heavy wind was coming down right on our home. i then got this terrible feeling and got too scared to get out of bed. i started calling out to my parents who are usually very light sleepers and whose room is only about ten feet away from mine, but they wouldn't respond. i continually yelled for them when suddenly the noise over the house got even louder before suddenly zooming off with a swoosh-like sound. as soon as it zoomed off, my parents suddenly awoke, saying that they only heard me call them once, when i actually called them about fifteen times. i then started shaking from head to toe for some reason. i kept shaking for about ten minutes, i have absolutely no idea why i was so frightened, it was almost as if my body was reacting to instinct or something. my parents then told me to sleep in their room because of the terrible condition that i was suddenly in. i eventually stopped shaking and fell asleep. then, when i awoke in the morning, my parents told me that about 45 minutes after i went to sleep, they were awoken by a strange screeching noise in the distance that seemed to sound similar to the noise that i described. i'm usually a skeptic and i look for logical explanations, but i couldn't find any explanation for the event. it definitely wasn't a helicopter or a jet. the only thing i could compare the noise with is with some type of huge hovercraft. it was especially strange that my parents didn't wake up when i first called them and the reaction that my body had to it. i felt jittery and sick to my stomach for a short while after the event. it didn't seem to give out a friendly vibe, that is for sure. the vehicle was so loud that i'm sure someone else in town must have heard it.
content.summary: Heard a loud, hovering sound over my house. it lasted a long time before flying away suddenly.

content.detailedDescription: I came across a groop of ufos on the ground that befor i knew it i walk right in the middle of them i was serounded i did not even know it then i herd a sound it was not loud but high pitch screaming sound four pitch 3652 3652 3652 3652 ear periceing i left the area as soon as i could the sound followed me all the way to my van about a 1/4 mile then it stoped i cant help running into them theysent o
content.summary: Been looking for gold with a detecter when came upon a very large groop of aleian ufos liveing in a area that i stumble into

content.detailedDescription: I was outside the front of my house waiting for them to show themselves as they always come out when i come out. it usually takes anywhere from two to five minutes for them to show up. i'v been doing this for one year now, ever since i got my first green laser. it was also in the evening around 6:00p at this time of year. by mere coincidence my son pointed to the sky where i had previously pointed the device and that is when we saw our first ufo's up close and just at tree top level. ever since that night i, along with others have witnessed odd things in the sky above my home. things like a flying triangle the size of three airliners and balls of light that come straight down to the ground or shoot perfectly parallel to the ground. great flashes of light and orbs that emerge from some type of portal after the flash. most of the time these objects keep some distance but on occasion they come too close for comfort. also on occasion - well actually quite frequently now , they communicate or react to my initial laser or flash light signal. last night was such a night. i was outside for no more than 2 to 3 minutes when i took my laser and shone a direct beam upwards. as usual, a medium intensity orb appears directly overhead traveling south to north. as usual, i froze. oddly enough they still frighten me even though i'v seen quite literally hundreds of these things since my first sighting a year ago. the orb proceeded as usual at a steady pace, although sometimes they travel at many different rates of speed including, slowing, accelerating, stopping and hovering. i let the orb pass me for a little bit so it would not be directly overhead, then i took my laser and directed a beam directly behind the craft (note: i do not and it is not advisable to train a light beam of any kind directly at a person or craft as this could lead to retinal damage of the pilot and compromise the safety of the craft). as soon as i released the button, the craft responded with an intense beam of white light right back at me. i used to think that they were either coming straight at me or they illuminated so bright that it appeared that they were coming straight at me, but now that i'v been seeing them for a while, i think their just retorting with a white beam of light back at me. immediately after this first orb was out of sight, two orbs, one in front of the other came from the north where the first orb went. again i watched these two orbs pass directly overhead but i did not train my laser until they were away from me, partially because i was afraid and because there was an airliner passing through the line of sight. after i had a clear line of sight i trained my laser to the rear of the trailing orb with the knowledge that if they were some type of human craft, this angle would not allow them to see the light source. immediately, both orbs began to either intensify in luminosity or train a beam of light right back at me. i was so excited because, although i'v been seeing orbs in pairs lately, this is the first time they simultaneously illuminated.
content.summary: Communication with one orb then two orbs side by side responding to my laser and flashlight.

content.detailedDescription: Watching news on local channel wavy tv 10, apparent at 5:30am, ufo appeared to be heading towards camera then goes off camera then appears traveling opposite direction with a trail, very un-nerving and goosebumps, appeared to travel off into horizon with great speed.
content.summary: Strange sighting on traffic cam

content.detailedDescription: Weather phenomenon. hole in clouds. cold. crop circles and unusual events in the region.
content.summary: Weather phenomenon. hole in clouds. cold. crop circles and unusual events in the region.

content.detailedDescription: I was feeding my dog outside, i was about to head back into the house when i noticed out of the corner of my eye something brighter and more colorful than an airplane would be at night. i turned my head to the left, and noticed about fifteen or so blinking multicolored lights in the shape of a horizontal oval. i have a wrap around porch that mostly faces the south, and i just stood there and watched this thing for about a minute, and it wasn't moving at all, just completely still. i didn't hear anything, and there was no wind at all that night. if i wouldn't have stopped to watch it, i would have just thought it was like a military jet or something weird, but the fact that this object was completely still and unmoving really freaked me out. so i ran inside and called for my friend who was inside the house, hoping this thing wouldn't be gone when i came back, and her and i just stood on the porch watching this thing, it looked like a flat disco ball. not the silvery mirrored ones, but the ones with all the multicolored lights that sort of pulsate and make you dizzy. the lights were white, yellow, green, blue, and red in color, and they all alternated in an oval shape. there was no particular pattern in which they blinked, but it was like they got dimmer and then brighter, way brighter than airplane lights. the lights were pulsating in an area about the size of a bottle cap, and the lights themselves were only like tiny dots. and i would guess it was about a mile or so away, and around 300 ft in the air. after i went and got my friend, we stood there just saying things like "what the hell is it? what kind of airplane is it?". she just thought it was an airplane, she kept saying over and over again, "it's moving, we just don't see it moving because it's so far away." but then it went from being stationary in the sky, to moving super slow in a straight line, and it took it about ten minutes or so to move across the sky. i felt really excited the entire time, i kept thinking that there was no way this was an airplane. my friend denied it was anything spectacular, but she stood with me and watched it the entire time it moved across the skyline. the object then got bright and shot straight up into the sky, and was gone. i felt sort of sick to my stomach, and my friend was really freaked out, because she went inside and drank two entire glasses of water. she said she felt really thirsty. i had this weird feeling of unease, and we were both very shaky.
content.summary: Was outside looking south west, noticed blinking lights in the sky, the ufo was very still and then moved super slow across the skyline for about three minutes. then shot straight up into the sky and was gone.

content.detailedDescription: This may not be classified as an ufo, but whatever we saw, we can't explain it.  i went outside to have a cigarette, and my grown nephew went outside as well.  we had no yard lights on, and it was quite dar.  the moon was just coming up, and it was mostly clear.  while we were looking up in the sky at two planes flying over, we both saw a flash of light in the sky slightly towards the east.  my nephew asked me if he saw it before i could say anything.  this is the second time i have seen this flash in the past 4 weeks.  it's quicker than lightning, and very localized in the sky.  i spend a lot of time looking at the stars at night, but have never seen anything like this before.  personally, i'm glad my nephew was out there, because i would have shrugged this off as.... my eyes playing tricks or something.
content.summary: Saw a flash of light in the sky
